operation.name: addSystem
operation.sql: INSERT INTO TB_SYSTEM (SYSID,SYSCODE,SYSNAME,SYSPATH,SYSDESC,SHOWORDER,ISVALIDATE,ISINSIDE) VALUES($sysId,$sysCode,$sysName,$sysPath,$sysDesc,$showOrder,$isValidate,$isInside)

operation.name: listSystem
operation.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM TB_SYSTEM WHERE SYSNAME LIKE '%$sysNameSH%' AND SYSCODE LIKE '%$sysCodeSH%'
SELECT * FROM TB_SYSTEM WHERE SYSNAME LIKE '%$sysNameSH%' AND SYSCODE LIKE '%$sysCodeSH%' ORDER BY SHOWORDER

operation.name: deleteSystem
operation.sql: DELETE FROM TB_WSM_INFO_NEWS WHERE INFOID IN(SELECT INFOID FROM TB_WSM_INFO_COLUMN WHERE COLUMNID IN(SELECT COLUMNID FROM TB_WSM_COLUMN WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId))
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_INFO_REF WHERE INFOID IN(SELECT INFOID FROM TB_WSM_INFO_COLUMN WHERE COLUMNID IN(SELECT COLUMNID FROM TB_WSM_COLUMN WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId))
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_INFO_WEB WHERE INFOID IN(SELECT INFOID FROM TB_WSM_INFO_COLUMN WHERE COLUMNID IN(SELECT COLUMNID FROM TB_WSM_COLUMN WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId))
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_INFO_SQLQUERY_LIST WHERE QUERYID IN(SELECT INFOID FROM TB_WSM_INFO_COLUMN WHERE COLUMNID IN(SELECT COLUMNID FROM TB_WSM_COLUMN WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId))
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_INFO_SQLQUERY_PARAMS WHERE QUERYID IN(SELECT INFOID FROM TB_WSM_INFO_COLUMN WHERE COLUMNID IN(SELECT COLUMNID FROM TB_WSM_COLUMN WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId))
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_INFO_SQLQUERY WHERE QUERYID IN(SELECT INFOID FROM TB_WSM_INFO_COLUMN WHERE COLUMNID IN(SELECT COLUMNID FROM TB_WSM_COLUMN WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId))
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_INFO_SERVICE_LIST WHERE SERVICEID IN(SELECT INFOID FROM TB_WSM_INFO_COLUMN WHERE COLUMNID IN(SELECT COLUMNID FROM TB_WSM_COLUMN WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId))
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_INFO_SERVICE_PARAMS WHERE SERVICEID IN(SELECT INFOID FROM TB_WSM_INFO_COLUMN WHERE COLUMNID IN(SELECT COLUMNID FROM TB_WSM_COLUMN WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId))
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_INFO_SERVICE WHERE SERVICEID IN(SELECT INFOID FROM TB_WSM_INFO_COLUMN WHERE COLUMNID IN(SELECT COLUMNID FROM TB_WSM_COLUMN WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId))
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_LINK WHERE LINKID IN(SELECT INFOID FROM TB_WSM_INFO_COLUMN WHERE COLUMNID IN(SELECT COLUMNID FROM TB_WSM_COLUMN WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId))
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_LINK_GROUP WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_LINK_TYPE WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_INFO_COLUMN WHERE COLUMNID IN(SELECT COLUMNID FROM TB_WSM_COLUMN WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId)
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_UNIT_COLUMN WHERE COLUMNID IN(SELECT COLUMNID FROM TB_WSM_COLUMN WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId)
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_UNIT WHERE LAYOUTID IN(SELECT LAYOUTID FROM TB_WSM_LAYOUT WHERE CHANNELID IN(SELECT CHANNELID FROM TB_WSM_CHANNEL WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId))
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_LAYOUT WHERE CHANNELID IN(SELECT CHANNELID FROM TB_WSM_CHANNEL WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId)
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_CHANNEL_COLUMN WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_COLUMN_PARAMS WHERE COLUMNID IN(SELECT COLUMNID FROM TB_WSM_COLUMN WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId)
DELETE FROM tb_wsm_role_column WHERE COLUMNID IN(SELECT COLUMNID FROM TB_WSM_COLUMN WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId)
DELETE FROM tb_wsm_role_channel WHERE CHANNELID IN(SELECT CHANNELID FROM TB_WSM_CHANNEL WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId)
DELETE FROM tb_wsm_user_system WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId
DELETE FROM tb_wsm_user_channel WHERE CHANNELID IN(SELECT CHANNELID FROM TB_WSM_CHANNEL WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId)
DELETE FROM tb_wsm_user_layout WHERE CHANNELID IN(SELECT CHANNELID FROM TB_WSM_CHANNEL WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId)
DELETE FROM tb_wsm_user_column WHERE COLUMNID IN(SELECT COLUMNID FROM TB_WSM_COLUMN WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId)
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_COLUMN WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_CHANNEL WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_SYS_THEMES WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_USER_GROUP WHERE GROUPID IN(SELECT GROUPID FROM TB_WSM_GROUP WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId)
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_GROUP_ROLE WHERE GROUPID IN(SELECT GROUPID FROM TB_WSM_GROUP WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId)
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_ROLE_PRIVILEGE WHERE ROLEID IN(SELECT ROLEID FROM TB_WSM_ROLE WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId)
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_ROLE WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_GROUP WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_PRIVILEGE WHERE SYSID=$checkSysId
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_SYS_CONF WHERE SYSID = $checkSysId
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_SYS_BACKGROUND WHERE SYSID = $checkSysId
DELETE FROM TB_SYSTEM WHERE SYSID = $checkSysId

operation.name: viewSystem
operation.sql: SELECT * FROM TB_SYSTEM WHERE SYSID = $sysId

operation.name: modifySystem
operation.sql: UPDATE TB_SYSTEM SET SYSCODE=$sysCode, SYSNAME=$sysName, SYSPATH=$sysPath, SYSDESC=$sysDesc, SHOWORDER=$showOrder, ISINSIDE=$isInside WHERE SYSID = $sysId

operation.name: toBindGroupForSystem
operation.sql: SELECT * FROM TB_SYSTEM WHERE SYSID = $checkSysId
SELECT TB_WSM_GROUP.* FROM TB_WSM_GROUP WHERE TB_WSM_GROUP.SYSID = $checkSysId AND ISDEFAULT='1'

SELECT TB_WSM_GROUP.* FROM TB_WSM_GROUP WHERE TB_WSM_GROUP.SYSID = $privSysId AND TB_WSM_GROUP.GROUPID NOT IN (SELECT TB_WSM_GROUP.DEFAULTID FROM TB_WSM_GROUP WHERE TB_WSM_GROUP.SYSID = $checkSysId AND ISDEFAULT='1' )

operation.name: doBindGroupForSystem
operation.sql: DELETE FROM TB_WSM_GROUP WHERE TB_WSM_GROUP.SYSID = $privSysId AND ISDEFAULT='1'

operation.name: bindGroupForSystem
operation.sql: INSERT INTO TB_WSM_GROUP(GROUPID,GROUPNAME,GROUPPARENTID,GROUPDESC,SHOWORDER,ISVALIDATE,SYSID,ISDEFAULT,DEFAULTID) VALUES($groupId,$groupName,$groupParentId,$groupDesc,$showOrder,'1',$sysId,'1',$oldGroupId)

operation.name: toInitPrivilegeForSubsystem
operation.sql: SELECT * FROM TB_SYSTEM WHERE SYSID = $checkSysId

operation.name: initPrivilegeForSubsystem
operation.sql: DELETE FROM TB_WSM_USER_GROUP WHERE TB_WSM_USER_GROUP.GROUPID IN( SELECT GROUPID FROM TB_WSM_GROUP WHERE TB_WSM_GROUP.SYSID = $checkSysId)
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_GROUP_ROLE WHERE TB_WSM_GROUP_ROLE.GROUPID IN( SELECT GROUPID FROM TB_WSM_GROUP WHERE TB_WSM_GROUP.SYSID = $checkSysId)
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_ROLE_PRIVILEGE WHERE TB_WSM_ROLE_PRIVILEGE.ROLEID IN( SELECT ROLEID FROM TB_WSM_ROLE WHERE TB_WSM_ROLE.SYSID = $checkSysId)
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_ROLE WHERE SYSID = $checkSysId
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_GROUP WHERE SYSID = $checkSysId
DELETE FROM TB_WSM_PRIVILEGE WHERE SYSID = $checkSysId

INSERT INTO TB_WSM_PRIVILEGE (PRIVID, PRIVNAME, PRIVCODE, PRIVDESC, PRIVADDR, PRIVPARENTID, PRIVTYPE, ISVALIDATE, PRIVORDER, SYSID) VALUES ($privSystemId, CONCAT($sysName,'{$mydbc.system.init.manager#}'), CONCAT($sysCode,'._manage'), CONCAT($sysName,'{$mydbc.system.init.privilege.manager#}'), '/', '-1', $funPrivTypeId, '1', '1', $checkSysId)

INSERT INTO TB_WSM_PRIVILEGE (PRIVID, PRIVNAME, PRIVCODE, PRIVDESC, PRIVADDR, PRIVPARENTID, PRIVTYPE, ISVALIDATE, PRIVORDER, SYSID) VALUES ($privManageId, '{$mydbc.system.init.system.manager#}', CONCAT($sysCode,'._role_manage'), CONCAT($sysName,'{$mydbc.system.init.privilege.manager#}'), '/', $privSystemId, $funPrivTypeId, '1', '1', $checkSysId)

INSERT INTO TB_WSM_PRIVILEGE (PRIVID, PRIVNAME, PRIVCODE, PRIVDESC, PRIVADDR, PRIVPARENTID, PRIVTYPE, ISVALIDATE, PRIVORDER, SYSID) VALUES ($privGroupId, '{$mydbc.system.init.usergroup.manager#}', CONCAT($sysCode,'._subsystem_group_manage'), '{$mydbc.system.init.usergroup.manager#}', concat('contoller.do?operation=listSubSystemGroup&curpage=1&groupNameSH=&sysId=',$checkSysId), $privManageId, $funPrivTypeId, '1', '1', $checkSysId)

INSERT INTO TB_WSM_PRIVILEGE (PRIVID, PRIVNAME, PRIVCODE, PRIVDESC, PRIVADDR, PRIVPARENTID, PRIVTYPE, ISVALIDATE, PRIVORDER, SYSID) VALUES ($privGroupAddId, '{$mydbc.system.init.add#}', CONCAT($sysCode,'._subsystem_group_manage_new'), '{$mydbc.system.init.usergroup.add#}', '/', $privGroupId, $operationPrivTypeId, '1', '1', $checkSysId)

insert into TB_WSM_group (GROUPID, GROUPNAME, GROUPPARENTID, GROUPDESC, ISVALIDATE, SHOWORDER, SYSID) values ($newSystemgroupId, CONCAT($sysName,'{$mydbc.system.init.usergroup#}'), '-1', '', '1', '1', $checkSysId)

insert into TB_WSM_group (GROUPID, GROUPNAME, GROUPPARENTID, GROUPDESC, ISVALIDATE, SHOWORDER, SYSID) values ($newSystemManageGroupId,'{$mydbc.system.init.admingroup#}', $newSystemgroupId, '', '1', '1', $checkSysId)
insert into TB_WSM_group_role (GROUPID, ROLEID) values ($newSystemManageGroupId, $newSysytemRoleId)
insert into TB_WSM_role_privilege (ROLEID, PRIVID) select $newSysytemRoleId, PRIVID from TB_WSM_PRIVILEGE where SYSID=$checkSysId AND ISVALIDATE='1'

operation.name: toAddThemesForSystem
operation.sql: SELECT TB_SYSTEM.* FROM TB_SYSTEM WHERE SYSID = $checkSysId

SELECT TB_WSM_THEMES.* FROM TB_WSM_THEMES WHERE TB_WSM_THEMES.THEMESID IN ( SELECT TB_WSM_THEMES.THEMESID FROM TB_WSM_SYS_THEMES,TB_WSM_THEMES WHERE TB_WSM_SYS_THEMES.THEMESID=TB_WSM_THEMES.THEMESID AND TB_WSM_SYS_THEMES.SYSID =$checkSysId) ORDER BY TB_WSM_THEMES.THEMESID

SELECT TB_WSM_THEMES.* FROM TB_WSM_THEMES WHERE TB_WSM_THEMES.ISVALIDATE='1' AND TB_WSM_THEMES.THEMESID NOT IN ( SELECT TB_WSM_THEMES.THEMESID FROM TB_WSM_SYS_THEMES,TB_WSM_THEMES WHERE TB_WSM_SYS_THEMES.THEMESID=TB_WSM_THEMES.THEMESID AND TB_WSM_SYS_THEMES.SYSID =$checkSysId) ORDER BY TB_WSM_THEMES.THEMESID

operation.name: doAddThemesForSystem
operation.sql: DELETE FROM TB_WSM_SYS_THEMES WHERE SYSID = $checkSysId

operation.name: addThemesForSystem
operation.sql: INSERT INTO TB_WSM_SYS_THEMES(SYSID,THEMESID) VALUES($checkSysId,$selectedThemes)

operation.name: toAddBackgroundForSystem
operation.sql: SELECT TB_SYSTEM.* FROM TB_SYSTEM WHERE SYSID = $checkSysId

SELECT TB_WSM_BACKGROUND.* FROM TB_WSM_BACKGROUND WHERE TB_WSM_BACKGROUND.BGDID IN ( SELECT TB_WSM_BACKGROUND.BGDID FROM TB_WSM_SYS_BACKGROUND,TB_WSM_BACKGROUND WHERE TB_WSM_SYS_BACKGROUND.BGDID=TB_WSM_BACKGROUND.BGDID AND TB_WSM_SYS_BACKGROUND.SYSID =$checkSysId) ORDER BY TB_WSM_BACKGROUND.BGDID

SELECT TB_WSM_BACKGROUND.* FROM TB_WSM_BACKGROUND WHERE TB_WSM_BACKGROUND.ISVALIDATE='1' AND TB_WSM_BACKGROUND.BGDID NOT IN ( SELECT TB_WSM_BACKGROUND.BGDID FROM TB_WSM_SYS_BACKGROUND,TB_WSM_BACKGROUND WHERE TB_WSM_SYS_BACKGROUND.BGDID=TB_WSM_BACKGROUND.BGDID AND TB_WSM_SYS_BACKGROUND.SYSID =$checkSysId) ORDER BY TB_WSM_BACKGROUND.BGDID

operation.name: doAddBackgroundForSystem
operation.sql: DELETE FROM TB_WSM_SYS_BACKGROUND WHERE SYSID = $checkSysId

operation.name: addBackgroundForSystem
operation.sql: INSERT INTO TB_WSM_SYS_BACKGROUND(SYSID,BGDID) VALUES($checkSysId,$selectedBackground)
